guide.introduction: This kit includes fingerprint analysis, blood typing, and lie detector.
guide.introduction_rendered:
This kit includes fingerprint analysis, blood typing, and lie detector.

Relevant parts
  • Chromotagraghy kit
  • Fingerprinting kit
  • Blood typing kit
  • DNA kit
  • Notes in a Folder that says "CLASSIFIED"
Tools
  • Flashlight
  • Goggles
  • Latex or nitrile gloves
  • Lie detector (found online)
  • Microscope and slides
  • Tweezers
  • Vials and test tubes

parts.text: Notes in a Folder that says "CLASSIFIED"

lines.text: Your chromotagraphy kit should include these items: Shallow glass jar, 1x6 inch pieces of paper, water, and a bag to hold everything. Now, you can take the suspect's pen, and put it in an evidence bag. You can then write a line on a bottom of paper. Dip it in the water, and see different colors. You can then compare that to the note.

lines.text: Your kit should include these items: Black paper, Baby powder, and clear tape. You can then use the baby powder on say, a cookie jar. Then, use the tape to lift the powder. Then, you can put that on the black paper to make it visible.

lines.text: Your DNA kit should include these items: cotton swabs, and a DNA tester. You can then swab the inside of your mouth, and put that under the DNA tester. And then, you can see the results, and compare that to other people.
